description:
Ryou has grown tired of seeing Tsubaki bullying Sayuri during their orientation exercise and casually gives her some timely help. Even as the instructors present their gorgeous desserts, the first cake made as a cooperative effort between Sayuri and Ryou makes a strong showing. Since the entrance ceremony, Ryou came across as a scary guy to Sayuri, but his passion for making sweets makes her see him in a new light.
Source: crunchyroll
